articles.title: How NASA’s MOXIE successfully generated oxygen on Mars - The Week
articles.description: American space agency NASA on Thursday announced that its oxygen-generating experiment that accompanied Perseverance rover has successfully generated oxygen on the Mars. MOXIE (Mars Oxygen In-Situ Resource Utilisation Experiment), developed by Massachusetts I…
articles.content: American space agency NASA on Thursday announced that its oxygen-generating experiment that accompanied Perseverance rover has successfully generated oxygen on the Mars. MOXIE (Mars Oxygen In-Situ Re… [+2462 chars]
